text: Nangni'n poongraal ningratong sikkha chimaru. Rangairu! Seitan in ningmalung ennasik tita nangni karra miring lekkhat kha mikhumna ah adasik eii, halli nangni poongraal nakha nisoom esik eii. Keidiang na-ngamnaru thina suok-innum, halli nangni raal matorna tumkha kei'n ringna lukhu kanapeii sik-eii.
